DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to beginning treatment post randomization.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to beginning of treatment but also post randomization.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Treatment cannot begin prior
ReferenceDocuments.description: Treatment cannot begin prior to randomization and must begin <= 14 days after randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Protocol treatment is to begin within 90 days of randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Treatment cannot begin prior to randomization and must begin <=14 days and after submission of Physician Fluoropyrimidine Treatment Decision Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Treatment cannot begin prior to randomization and must begin <=21 days after randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Intervention cannot begin prior to Registration/Randomization and must begin <=14 days after Registration/Randomization

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-2 2018320v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
